@Gary_short1 @EastonDaz 😂😂😂, fuck sake lads. A lot needs to happen for that muppet to be next PM 😂
@EastonDaz @Gary_short1 If Theresa May loses her majority, especially by 20 odd seats, she'll resign. Don't rule out another one a these fucking elections 😂

@Gary_short1 Just no overall majority for any party, got it at 7/1
@Gary_short1 Aye pretty much. They just take a sample of folk by asking what they voted after they have. Nah no at all, great for my bet but 😂😂
@Gary_short1 https://t.co/hevcJSvgwn explains it better than I could mate. A lot more accurate than a normal poll cause folk have already voted
Exit polls in elections tend to be pretty accurate. Still can't see the SNP losing 22 seats but 😳😳

@vikkiferrier It only matters if it's a constituency where the Tories might win. Livingston constituency they've no chance, so voting Lab or SNP is fine
